name: To Hell With Guns
description:
"To Hell With Guns" is a short dungeon crawler.

Play as the default party or create your own and apprehend a dungeon, its traps, secrets and inhabitants in your way to defeat the dark overlord.

The game was only tested on Windows. Two versions are included. The second version includes the JAVA Runtime Environment, feel free to download it if you don't have JAVA installed on your computer.
